item.title: Compilers Introduction
item.description: If you’ve ever found yourself intrigued by the complex science behind how exactly your written code transforms into an understandable stream of zeroes and ones, then you’re in exactly the right place. The realm of computer science goes far beyond just writing lines of code â€” at its core, it is about facilitating communication between humans and machines. This blog post pulls back the curtain on one such essential tool that makes this interaction possible: compilers.
